resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Most corrections in the text are made late, including the correction from Jean Tréjean to Jean Vlajean, and later Valjean.
resource.chars: Most corrections in the text are made late, including the correction from Jean Tréjean to Jean Vlajean, and later Valjean.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: This marginal addition  at the bottom belongs to the first phase, the line is thiner, and Jean Tréjean was already corrected in Jean Valjean.
resource.chars: This marginal addition  at the bottom belongs to the first phase, the line is thiner, and Jean Tréjean was already corrected in Jean Valjean.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The two distinct phases of the writing process are visible. The marginal addition at the top belongs to the second phase, the line is thicker.
resource.chars: The two distinct phases of the writing process are visible. The marginal addition at the top belongs to the second phase, the line is thicker.
